name: Coconut Racing Simulator
description:
Do you like racing, do you like playing hards game. Well you came to the wrong place. Coconut Racing is the most frustrating racing game (i think) ever.

This game is inspired by GMod 9's Melon Racer.

The levels are intentionally frustrating and hard. I doubt that anyone can level 8 at all, under 3 minutes.

The coconut can only move forward and back with W, S and rotate with the mouse.

WARNING! THIS GAME MIGHT HAVE A COUPLE BUGS/GLITCHES PLEASE TELL ME SO I CAN FIX THEM!
